snippet: The singer-songwriter and his husband, Jörn Weisbrodt, have spruced up the Gramercy apartment that Mr. Wainwright bought when he was living “the bohemian life.”
abstract: Musician Rufus Wainright shares 450 square foot studio near Gramercy Park in Manhattan with his husband Jorn Weisbrodt; pair has made the most of small space by decorating it with scenic wallpaper and art.
lead_paragraph: The singer-songwriter and his husband, Jörn Weisbrodt, have spruced up the Gramercy apartment that Mr. Wainwright bought when he was living “the bohemian life.”

headline.seo: Rufus Wainwright’s Studio Remake: Add Husband and Wallpaper
headline.main: Rufus Wainwright’s Studio Remake: Add Husband and Wallpaper
headline.print_headline: The Studio Remake: Add Husband and Wallpaper
